page.title: 03Unemployed in Killamarsh
page.content: We interviewed an unemployed person. Before he was unemployed he had a railway job and lots of other jobs including coal mining. He lost his railway job because the stations closed down. He can't drive and would not like to learn because there is too much traffic. He would like a building job. He hasn't got any qualifications. His hobbies are cycling and swimming.He has no pets.He has always lived in Killamarsh.He used to go to Killamarsh Infants and Juniors.He has never been on T.V. He has been abroad and he went to Belgium Holland and Ireland .He got there by ferry.He likes Killamarsh and he likes Norwood best.He thinks Rother Valley Country Park is lovely. He liked school.He liked his railway job best.
